history.proof: intros n ts v1 v2 s1 s2 Hneq Hfree1 Hfree2. induction ts. - simpl. qsimpl time: 1 use: subTermExch. - simpl. hauto use: subTermExch.

ctx: intros n ts v1 v2 s1 s2 Hneq Hfree1 Hfree2.
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language Formula := fol.Formula L : Set Formulas := fol.Formulas L : Set System := fol.System L : Type Term := fol.Term L : Set Terms := fol.Terms L : nat -> Set var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L orH := fol.orH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L andH := fol.andH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L existH := fol.existH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L iffH := fol.iffH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L SysPrf := folProof.SysPrf L : fol.System L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop v1, v2 : nat s1, s2 : Term Hneq : v1 <> v2 Hfree1 : ~ In v2 (freeVarTerm L s1) Hfree2 : ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) Unable to unify "substituteTerm L (substituteTerm L ?M1426 ?M1427 ?M1429) ?M1428 ?M1430 = substituteTerm L (substituteTerm L ?M1426 ?M1428 ?M1430) ?M1427 ?M1429" with "Tnil L = Tnil L".

ctx: intros n ts v1 v2 s1 s2 Hneq Hfree1 Hfree2.
exceptions.exn: No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.

ctx: intros n ts v1 v2 s1 s2 Hneq Hfree1 Hfree2.
exceptions.exn: The reference IHts1 was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros n ts v1 v2 s1 s2 Hneq Hfree1 Hfree2.
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language Formula := fol.Formula L : Set Formulas := fol.Formulas L : Set System := fol.System L : Type Term := fol.Term L : Set Terms := fol.Terms L : nat -> Set var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L orH := fol.orH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L andH := fol.andH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L existH := fol.existH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L iffH := fol.iffH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L SysPrf := folProof.SysPrf L : fol.System L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop n : nat t : fol.Term L ts : fol.Terms L n v1, v2 : nat s1, s2 : Term Hneq : v1 <> v2 Hfree1 : ~ In v2 (freeVarTerm L s1) Hfree2 : ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) IHts : substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v1 s1) v2 s2 = substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v2 s2) v1 s1 Hin : nat The term "Hin" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "In v2 (freeVarTerm L s1)".

ctx: intros n ts v1 v2 s1 s2 Hneq Hfree1 Hfree2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros n ts v1 v2 s1 s2 Hneq Hfree1 Hfree2.
exceptions.exn: The reference IHts2 was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros n ts v1 v2 s1 s2 Hneq Hfree1 Hfree2.

original: intros n ts v1 v2 s1 s2 Hneq Hfree1 Hfree2. induction ts. - simpl. apply subTermExch. auto. all: apply Hfree1 + apply Hfree2. - simpl. f_equal. + apply IHts1. all: intros Hin; apply (Hfree1 Hin). + apply IHts2. all: intros Hin; apply (Hfree2 Hin).
